message: List all available agents and their installation status
Show only installed agents
Check system health, dependencies, and AI configuration
Run built-in agent interactively
Run built-in agent with a task
Run Claude Code agent (if installed)
Run Codex agent (if installed)
Start assistant in a specific project directory
Install Codex - OpenAI coding assistant
Uninstall an agent you no longer need
Enable debug mode to see detailed logs and tool execution
Configure CodeMie with your AI provider
Configure using OpenAI-specific variables (advanced)
Override model for specific run
Override model for Claude agent
Set model globally across all runs
Increase timeout for long-running AI requests
Type 'clear' in interactive mode to reset conversation history
Type 'exit' in interactive mode to quit the assistant
CodeMie Code has filesystem, git, and command line tools built-in
Use doctor command to troubleshoot configuration issues
Provider is auto-detected from model name (gpt=OpenAI, claude via LiteLLM/Bedrock)
All agents support the same generic env vars (CODEMIE_BASE_URL, CODEMIE_AUTH_TOKEN, etc.)
Copy text: Hold Shift while selecting with mouse
Copy text on macOS: Hold Option/Alt while selecting with mouse
Paste text: Use Cmd+V (macOS) or Ctrl+Shift+V (Linux/Windows)
Some terminals require Fn key modifier for text selection
iTerm2 users: Option+Mouse drag to select and copy text
Right-click paste works in most terminal emulators
